Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run only: the metro parks website states Bucks is groomed for skate and classic. While technically true, it was groomed yesterday, not today. So with the slushing up in the warm sunshine yesterday and the overnight freeze, the classic tracks are icy and debris filled. Skate deck is hard and fast. Would be nice if the groomers would use those 2 big piles of snow, but rumor has it they are short staffed this week.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power tilled and tracked before noon today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The snow froze solid after the slopes were groomed early this morning. We are now grooming the slopes a second time to create the best conditions we can today. This second groom will mean a slightly delayed opening for Pintail Peak. If you venture off the groomed areas expect to find icy snow. On the groomed areas the skiing should be good. Pintail Peak Lodge will be open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. today with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
